syllabus: CLAT 2025 syllabus includes English Language, Current Affairs including GK, Legal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, and Quantitative Techniques.
english_questions: There are around 28-32 questions in the English section of CLAT.
cutoff_nlsiu: The CLAT 2024 cut-off for NLSIU Bangalore was around AIR 114 for general category.
